titles.title: To extend the deadline for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project in Pennsylvania.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 6/28/2001--Introduced. Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon licensee request, to extend the time period during which the licensee is required to commence construction of a specified hydroelectric project in Pennsylvania for three consecutive two-year periods.Allows for reinstatement of an expired license.
